monster.name: Glom Goblin
languages: understands all languages it spoke before he was possessed

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Glom Goblin makes two Scimitar or Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Glom Wanderer Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it spoke before he was possessed

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Glom Wanderer Skeleton can attack one creature with two attacks or up to three creatures in a cone of 5 feet in front of him.

action.name: Broken Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Extreme Speed
entries: The Glom Wanderer Skeleton can do a back step of 5 feet, without any opportunity attack, instead of his movement.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Glom inside the skeleton grants him to cast the following spell, using Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks):

trait.name: Battle Readiness
entries: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Improved Critical
entries: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.

trait.name: Martial Role
entries: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

action.name: Extra Attack
entries: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the {@action Attack} action on its turn.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Orwyn studied a lot to bend the magic. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Anti spell
entries: When the knight is wearing the armour, any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target is vanish.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Phebe makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Knights are warriors who pledge service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes. A knight's alignment determines the extent to which a pledge is honored. Whether undertaking a quest or patrolling a realm, a knight often travels with an entourage that includes squires and hirelings who are commoners.

trait.name: Anti spell
entries: When the knight is wearing the armour, any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target is vanish.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Phebe makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Fury attack (1/Day)
entries: Phebe can make a third melee attack.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a {@status surprised} creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 14 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bojats makes two shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Light Crossbow

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bojats makes two shortsword or Poisoned Fist attacks.

action.name: Poisoned Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Frightful Presence (Red Glom)
entries: Each creature who see a Possessed Bojats must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the Bojats is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the bojats's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Red Glom Possession
entries: A creature possessed by a Red Glom, obtain +4 to Strength, +2 to Dexterity, Constitution and Wisdom, -4 to Intelligence and Charisma.
They become immune to the {@condition paralyzed} conditioned, gain proficiency in intimidation skill and lost the ability to speak, except for screaming.

bonus.name: Powerfull Punch
entries: If the Bojats hits a target with a Poisoned Fist attack, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from the Bojats.

spell.name: Shadow Ball
entries: A ball of dark energy streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} force damage.

The spell creates more than one ball when you reach higher levels: two balls at 5th level, three balls at 11th level, and four balls at 17th level. You can direct the balls at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each creature targeted.
